ProductSellingModelDataTranslation.name: ProductSellingModelDataTranslation
ProductSellingModelDataTranslation.description: Represents the translated values of the data stored within the ProductSellingModel record’s fields.

IsOutOfDate.description: Indicates whether the translation is out-of-date (true) or current (false). A translation is out-of-date if the parent Product2 record is updated after the last translation was filed.

Language.description: The language for these translated values.

Name.description: The translated value for the ProductSellingModel record name. This field is required to translate the text in other fields.

ParentId.description: The ID of the ProductSellingModel record associated with the data that’s being translated.
